issue.title: [CF 1137] Request for a right to left bar
issue.body:
I'd like to request to have a "reverse bar"  option where the text is on the left, the bar goes from right to left and the icon is on the right of the bar.

The text and bar direction can currently be changed so it's only the icon placement that would need to be implemented. Not sure if it's possible or not.

Thanks for your time.


> Posted by CurseForge user Mewslie | Imported from CurseForge issue #1137 | Raw
